Introduction
This topic contains information on the KC record groups, including
where to obtain POW records from the KC
Record Group 319
,
Records of the Army Staff
, and
records relating to the FPOW status of Veterans of the KC
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section B - Former Prisoner of War (FPOW) Service Records
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section B
